@Manifest.Section

Package ball.annotation

Provides Annotation implementation classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Manifest
    Annotations to generate a JAR META-INF/MANIFEST.MF.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ConstantValueMustConvertTo
    Annotation to specify a field constant expression must convert to the specified type.
    Manifest.Attribute
    Attribute name
    Manifest.DependsOn
    Depends-On
    Manifest.DesignTimeOnly
    Design-Time-Only
    Manifest.JavaBean
    Java-Bean
    Manifest.MainClass
    Main-Class
    Manifest.Section
    Package section
    MatcherGroup
    Annotation to mark a bean field or method with a Matcher group.
    PatternRegex
    Annotation to mark a type with a Pattern regex.
    ResourceFile
    Annotation to provide resource file fragments.
    ServiceProviderFor
    Annotation to mark service providers.

Package ball.annotation Description

Provides Annotation implementation classes.

Allen D. Ball
